title: (x) Manchester International Festival logo - custom designed by Paul Barnes {Kris Sowersby}
content:
Hi, I’m new to the forum. Could anyone help me out please?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081008105430im_/http:/typophile.com/files/branding_logo_4350.gif)

 [‹ (x) Coldwell Banker logo - similar to BD Bankwell, ITC Berkeley Oldstyle {Raph, Angel}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081008105430/http:/typophile.com/node/38119 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Two fonts on shirts - Revue, Brush Stroke Fast {Akira, Mike F} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081008105430/http:/typophile.com/node/38073 "Go to next forum topic")
author: territory

comments.content:
I vaguely recall seeing this described as custom type in some design firm’s portfolio, but others may be better informed than I.

A face in a similar vein is Font Bureau’s Avia:  
 [http://fontbureau.com/fonts/Avia](http://web.archive.org/web/20081008105430/http:/fontbureau.com/fonts/Avia "http://fontbureau.com/fonts/Avia")
Am I missing something at the Paul Barnes site? Am I supposed to be able to click somewhere on those columns of handlettered type? Is the “more” button supposed to take me somewhere?

Marc, the ‘more’ button will take you on a round-trip through all his works. I don’t wanna deep-link, but the one is question is on position 39. If you open one of the images in a new window (right-click), you know what to do to the URL.

Obviously a tough one.  
Thanks for your help marcox. cheers!
Ah Paul Barnes it is. Nice one Kris!! Thanks alot.
